data.title: best read ever
data.meta_description: i read digital fortress by dan brown it wass great suspense novel. it has alot of info on cryptography... amazing do read it.
data.text:
I still haven't read that or Deception Point =( I've read Angels and Demons and The Da Vinci Code but I haven't seen the film adaptations

I really liked Digital Fortress -I have read it a few times now. It is one of his best books -Deception Point is probably my least favourite.

I've read pretty much all of Dan Brown's books. Digital Fortress was definitely a good read. His research into each subject really shows in his work. Deception Point was good too. I didn't like Angels and Demons that much, probably because I backtracked from Da Vinci Code and although they don't relate much, I just felt disconnected from it.

i read digital fortress by dan brown it wass great suspense novel. it has alot of info on cryptography... amazing do read it.

Best read? C'mon... it wasn't that good and it was his first novel.
